eduversum.name: KTechlab
eduversum.description: KTechlab is a developers tool for electrical circuits and micro controllers. The program can simulate many discrete components (logical, linear, integrating, non-linear and reactive). The simulation and error correction of PIC (Programmable Intelligent Computer) micro-controllers is carried out by gpsim (a multi-functional software simulator for PIC micro-controllers by Microchip). KTechlab is based on the higher programming systems Flowcode (for the creating of program flowcharts) and Microbe (a basic-like programming language). Created programs can be applied onto a specific circuit design (a 'virtual PIC') so that more complex micro-controller based circuits can be created.
